description: Checks whether the Uncomplicated Firewall (UFW) is installed, enabled, and logging on the system. Produces NDJSON output summarizing the firewall status, including enforcement state and logging configuration. Writes results atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback if locked.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: LogMaxKB
script_parameters.description: Maximum size of the log file (KB) before rotation.

script_parameters.name: LogKeep
script_parameters.description: Number of rotated log files to keep.
